desc.en: On a snowy day, Cherino invites [USERNAME] Sensei to Red Winter Academy to make a snowman and have a snowball fight.
desc.jp: On a snowy day, Cherino invites [USERNAME] Sensei to Red Winter Academy to make a snowman and have a snowball fight.
desc.zh_cn: 在下雪的日子，{cf洁莉诺}邀请[USERNAME]老师到{sn赤冬}学园做雪人、打雪仗等，度过愉快的时光。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purges, snowball fights

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purges, snowball fights

desc.en: Sensei is invited to Hanae's room, where Hanae has prepared stockings and snacks for Santa.
desc.jp: Sensei is invited to Hanae's room, where Hanae has prepared stockings and snacks for Santa.
desc.zh_cn: 老师受邀前往{cf花绘}的房间。{cf花绘}为了迎接圣诞老人而准备了袜子和点心。

hobby.jp: ダンス、チアリーディング

name.zh_cn: 特训！通往圣诞老人之路！

hobby.jp: ダンス、チアリーディング

desc.en: Sensei runs into Serina, who is giving out gifts to children in celebration of the Holy Night. Snow starts to fall and the night grows colder, so Sensei gives Serina a gift of her own.
desc.jp: Sensei runs into Serina, who is giving out gifts to children in celebration of the Holy Night. Snow starts to fall and the night grows colder, so Sensei gives Serina a gift of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 老师遇见了在平安夜分发礼物给孩子们的{cf芹奈}。不知不觉下起雪来了，老师送围巾给怕冷的{cf芹奈}。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Serina secretly pays a visit to Sensei, who's on break, but they notice her before long. As thanks for the scarf, Serina presents Sensei with a comprehensive health kit and an acupressure session, and the two have a splendid time together.
desc.jp: Serina secretly pays a visit to Sensei, who's on break, but they notice her before long. As thanks for the scarf, Serina presents Sensei with a comprehensive health kit and an acupressure session, and the two have a splendid time together.
desc.zh_cn: {cf芹奈}偷偷跑来找正在休息的老师，但很快就被老师发现了。{cf芹奈}为了报答上次的围巾，送给了老师综合健康组合，以及帮他进行了指压，两人度过了愉快的时光。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: While Cherino festively walks the streets of Red Winter Academy, she is caught by the Labor Party during a protest and tied to a pile of firewood.
desc.jp: While Cherino festively walks the streets of Red Winter Academy, she is caught by the Labor Party during a protest and tied to a pile of firewood.
desc.zh_cn: {sn赤冬}联邦学园充满了节日的气氛，这使得目前失去权力的{cf洁莉诺}感到有些不满。这时，{cf洁莉诺}被示威中的「工务部」捉住，并绑在一堆柴火上。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purges, snowball fights

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

hobby.zh_cn_jp: 罢工运动、游行示威、工作
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 罢工运动、游行示威、工作

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Cherino invites Sensei to Red Winter Academy for the Ivan Kupala Festival. However, Cherino is overthrown in a sudden coup... Thus begins Cherino's revolution to reclaim the presidency!
desc.jp: Cherino invites Sensei to Red Winter Academy for the Ivan Kupala Festival. However, Cherino is overthrown in a sudden coup... Thus begins Cherino's revolution to reclaim the presidency!
desc.zh_cn:
{cf洁莉诺}邀请老师来{sn赤冬}联邦学园迎接「伊凡．库帕拉」夏季庆典。
但是，由于突如其来的政变，{cf洁莉诺}下台了……
为了夺回会长的宝座，{cf洁莉诺}的革命开始了！

desc.en: Cherino invites Sensei to Red Winter Academy for the Ivan Kupala Festival. However, Cherino is overthrown in a sudden coup... Thus begins Cherino's revolution to reclaim the presidency!
desc.jp: Cherino invites Sensei to Red Winter Academy for the Ivan Kupala Festival. However, Cherino is overthrown in a sudden coup... Thus begins Cherino's revolution to reclaim the presidency!
desc.zh_cn:
{cf洁莉诺}邀请老师来{sn赤冬}联邦学园迎接「伊凡．库帕拉」夏季庆典。
但是，由于突如其来的政变，{cf洁莉诺}下台了……
为了夺回会长的宝座，{cf洁莉诺}的革命开始了！

desc.en: It's a snowy white Christmas morning. Dressed in Santa suits, Serina and Hanae are hard at work preparing for charity activities with Sensei. Meanwhile, Mine heads out to the field while espousing the Remedial Knights' creed of aid and salvation.
desc.jp: It's a snowy white Christmas morning. Dressed in Santa suits, Serina and Hanae are hard at work preparing for charity activities with Sensei. Meanwhile, Mine heads out to the field while espousing the Remedial Knights' creed of aid and salvation.
desc.zh_cn: 降下白雪的圣诞节清晨。穿着圣诞服的{cf芹奈}和{cf花绘}正在和老师一起忙着准备慈善活动。{cf美祢}决定贯彻{cn救护骑士团}应该具备的救护信念，于是便出发前往现场。

hobby.jp: ダンス、チアリーディング

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

name.en: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.jp: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.zh_cn: 教堂的圣诞祝福～{cn救护骑士团}的礼物～

desc.en: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.jp: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯今年也迎来了圣诞节。这是所有人一同分享喜悦的神圣日子。在这样的日子里，{cn救护骑士团}仍一如既往地四处「救护」，让我们来一窥她们既日常又特别的一天吧～

name.en: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.jp: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.zh_cn: 教堂的圣诞祝福～{cn救护骑士团}的礼物～
